short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extention is changing marked text to your other keyboard layout

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is changing marked text to your other keyboard layout!
How to install?
1. Install KeyCh App.
2. Open popup with keyboard logo.
3. Pick your other language. (if you didn't find it I will add it, please let me know) 
4. Click submit.

How does it works?
1.go to every page and write whatever you want.
2. mark the text you want to change
3. press CTRL + SHIFT
4. the other language keyboard layout should be appeared
